entity.description:
To run the test you need to run a component server.  
Testing documentation can be found [here](https://github.com/Talend/component-runtime/tree/master/talend-component-maven-plugin/src/it/web)  
Api documentation is here [component/icon](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html#/Component/icon) [component/icon/family](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html#/Component/familyIcon) 
Action documentation is [here for schema](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/services-actions.html#_schema)

Set of demo icon rules:  
* light contain green
* dark contain grey
* legacy b&w

Set of demo icon content:  
* family
  * contains svg and png icon
  * present in dark and light theme and legacy
* mapper
  * contains ONLY svg 
  * present in dark and light theme and legacy
* output
  * contains ONLY png
  * present in dark and light theme and legacy
* input
  * contains ONLY png
  * not present in theme only in legacy
entity.name: tck-component-icon-api-test

entity.description:
Expected: error 404 without body  
The call without providing id parameter
entity.name: component/icon - error - missing id

entity.description:
Expected: error 404 with body

entity.name: component/icon - error - wrong id
